prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: Me. What more can I say? This is my third year as a young (but skilled!) lawyer.
Character 1
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.
Character 2
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.
Character 3
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.
Character 4
Name: Adrian Andrews
Description: Head of planning, promotion, and security of the Treasures of Kurain Exhibit.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Mask☆DeMasque
Description: A flashy thief who steals valuable works of art. Sends a calling card before a heist.
Character 7
Name: Luke Atmey
Description: An Ace Detective. Has great powers of deduction, yet rarely makes sense.
Character 8
Name: Ron DeLite
Description: A young man who turned himself in as Mask☆DeMasque. A bit of a pitiful guy.
Character 9
Name: Desirée DeLite
Description: Ron DeLite's wife. Seems to be a very friendly and out-going lady.
Character 10
Name: Larry Butz
Description: My friend. I've known this trouble magnet ever since grade school.
Character 11
Name: Godot
Description: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.
Character 12
Name: Kane Bullard
Description: CEO of KB Security. His body was found inside his safe.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.
Evidence 2
Name: Treasure Exhibit Poster
Description: A poster for the Treasures of Kurain exhibit. The Sacred Urn of Kurain Village will be displayed in Lordly Tailor.
Evidence 3
Name: Ami Fey's Golden Statue
Description: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Is holding the Shichishito. A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Moved the night of the crime. Carried into the basement warehouse the day of the crime. Moved again that night.
Evidence 4
Name: Sacred Urn
Description: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, it looks like a plain old pot. One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, but has no monetary value. Found in the office of Luke Atmey. Has pink splotches all over it. Found in Atmey's Office. Covered in pink splotches, but it's the genuine article. Broken and repaired by Adrian 2 weeks ago, then replaced in its box. Kept out of sight.
Evidence 5
Name: DeMasque's Calling Card
Description: Sent before a heist, the emblem is top-secret. Click here for details.
Evidence 6
Name: Shichishito
Description: A ceremonial sword held in the hand of Ami Fey's statue. Wasn't bent before the crime. DeMasque knocked Atmey out during the crime w/ a blow to the back of the head.
Evidence 7
Name: Camera Data
Description: The warehouse camera went off at around 1 AM on the night of the crime.
Evidence 8
Name: Desirée's Letter
Description: Addressed to her husband Ron DeLite. Apparently contains something important.
Evidence 9
Name: Security Camera Photo
Description: Photo of storeroom entrance taken by the camera. Click here for details.
Evidence 10
Name: Blackmail Letter
Description: Written with a fountain pen. Found in Ron's room. Click here to read. Found in Ron DeLite's room. Written by Bullard. Click here to read.
Evidence 11
Name: Ron's Wallet
Description: Found by Larry at his part-time security job's company building (night of the crime).
Evidence 12
Name: Key Card
Description: Found inside Ron's wallet. Apparently used for the building of his part-time job. Found in Ron's wallet. Opens the KB Security CEO's office. Leaves a record when used. Found in Ron's wallet. Used on October 12th, the night of the crime, at 1 AM.
Evidence 13
Name: Publicity Photo
Description: A shot of Mask☆DeMasque striking a pose. Click here for details.
Evidence 14
Name: DeMasque's Broach
Description: Found in the shadow of Ami Fey's statue. Looks like it was torn off of some clothing.
Evidence 15
Name: Kane's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 10/12 at 1 AM. Cause: Cerebral hemorrhaging from blunt trauma to the head.
Evidence 16
Name: Newspaper Clipping
Description: An article on Mask☆DeMasque's first heist. Click here for details. About first heist. Guard in photo is Ron DeLite. Click here for details.
Evidence 17
Name: CEO Office Buzzer
Description: Connected to the basement Security Guard Office. There are no fingerprints on it.
Evidence 18
Name: Kane's List
Description: Found on a table at the crime scene. Click here for details.
Evidence 19
Name: Buzzer Record
Description: The buzzer went off once at 1:02 AM on October 12 in the CEO's office.
Evidence 20
Name: Ron's Testimony
Description: From DeMasque's 2nd heist on, he was stealing as directed by blackmail letters.
Evidence 21
Name: Urn Box
Description: A wooden box that had the Sacred Urn in it. Has pink paint stains on it.
Evidence 22
Name: Paint Marks
Description: Completely dry. The box of the Sacred Urn fits in the gap perfectly. When Adrian dropped the urn's box 2 weeks ago she also knocked over some paint.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Mask☆DeMasque is a master thief that first started his crime spree 6 months ago.
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 1
Testimony: He's so confident that he sends his calling card before he even commits the crime!
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 2
Testimony: This was his fifth heist, and as usual, he sent a card on to Lordly Tailor.
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 3
Testimony: His pattern is to always go after only the most precious art pieces.
Person: Gumshoe
Testimony 4
Testimony: That's why we're sure it was Mask☆DeMasque, sir. It fits his M. O. to a T!
Person: Gumshoe

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else. Let's think step by step:
response:
To find a contradictory pair of evidence and testimony, we need to look for statements made in the testimonies that do not align with the information in the evidence. 

In this case, let's focus on the evidence regarding the activities of Mask☆DeMasque and the timeline of events. 

Testimony 0 states that Mask☆DeMasque "first started his crime spree 6 months ago," which implies that he has been active within that timeframe. However, the evidence related to the crime (like the Security Camera Photo and Camera Data) clearly timestamps the specific events relating to the crime at the Treasures of Kurain exhibit and informs us about the timeline of the thefts.

Specifically, if we look at Testimony 2, it asserts "This was his fifth heist, and as usual, he sent a card on to Lordly Tailor." Depending on the timeline of the document that states the sequence of heists, if they have been occurring regularly and the current incident at Kurain has just happened, this would also mean that there were possibly ongoing thefts or timelines that are questioned against the evidence presented. 

However, we must identify one distinct contradiction. 

The evidence indicates a specific event (Kane Bullard's death at 1 AM on October 12) involved with the theft, while the testimony remains vague about the time of the heist regarding Mask’s identity possibly being at the same location also creates a conflict. 

Additionally, if Kane Bullard's death happened at 1 AM and Mask☆DeMasque committed a heist during this time, it's questionable whether he sent the card prior to committing that specific crime. The evidence about the autopsy and the timeframe conflicts with the idea that he acted that night while simultaneously being linked to prior thefts according to the testimonies.

Thus, the conflicting evidence involves the timeline of activities versus the claims made about Mask DeMasque's consistent actions.

The selected contradictory pair comes from:
- **Evidence 15 (Kane's Autopsy Report)** suggests a specific death time related to an event directly impacting Mask's timeline and actions.
- **Testimony 0** refers to the start of Mask's spree that provides ground for how long he has been active and leads to inconsistency about his movements on the date of Kane's death.

So, the contradictory pair is:

{"evidence": 15, "testimony": 0}

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: It was approximately 1 o'clock in the morning... just after the date changed.
Person: Atmey
Testimony 1
Testimony: That's when my nemesis, the infamous Mask☆DeMasque, dancingly descended upon me!
Person: Atmey
Testimony 2
Testimony: Just as I began to turn, the coward struck a fierce blow upon my noble head!
Person: Atmey
Testimony 3
Testimony: Darkness swallowed me before I could land a single strike. When I awoke, he was gone.
Person: Atmey
Testimony 4
Testimony: Thirty minutes later, I used an emergency phone to notify the police!
Person: Atmey

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else. Let's think step by step:
response:
To identify contradictions between evidence and testimonies, we need to analyze the statements made by characters, particularly Luke Atmey's testimonies, and check them against relevant evidence.

Luke Atmey's testimonies outline the sequence of events during which he was attacked by Mask☆DeMasque. Testimony 0 states that the event occurred at approximately 1 o'clock in the morning. Testimony 1 describes the entrance of Mask☆DeMasque, who then attacks him (Testimony 2), resulting in Atmey losing consciousness (Testimony 3). He states he did not notify the police until thirty minutes later (Testimony 4).

Now, let's look at the evidence related to the crime. Kane Bullard's autopsy report (Evidence 15) notes that the time of death was 1 AM – the same time Atmey reports being attacked, and the fact that he lost consciousness.

However, significant evidence contradicts Atmey's claim that he used an emergency phone thirty minutes after being attacked. The buzzer record (Evidence 19) indicates that the buzzer went off once at 1:02 AM in the CEO's office, which suggests a different timeline of events where someone else could have used the phone at that time or made the call immediately after the attack.

Thus, there is a contradiction between Testimony 4 (that he waited thirty minutes) and the buzzer record (showing an action immediately after the time he was attacked).

Thus, the conflicting pair is:
{"evidence": 19, "testimony": 4}

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else. Let's think step by step:
response:
To find the pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other, we analyze the testimonies provided by Luke Atmey, relevant moments in time that relate to the evidence, and their descriptions.

From Atmey's testimony (specifically Testimony 2), he claims that a thief rendered him senseless, implying that he was attacked and knocked out. The evidence that contradicts this would likely relate to the events surrounding the crime, particularly the time of Atmey's alleged attack.

Evidence 15 provides an autopsy report for Kane Bullard, indicating that he died at 1 AM due to blunt force trauma. This timing is critical since Testimony 2 implies Atmey was attacked around the same time. If Atmey was rendered senseless earlier, his account of being knocked out seems unconvincing given that Bullard was also a victim at that same hour.

Now let's determine a clear pair:

- Evidence 15 (Kane's Autopsy Report)
- Testimony 2 (Atmey's claim of being knocked out)

This leads to the following conclusion:

{"evidence": 15, "testimony": 2}
